title.ulink: Kostas Koudaras: What is the Evergreen Project? An interview with Wolfgang Rosenauer

blockquote.para: Having a distribution that gives you a two year support for ALL editions is another fascinating aspect of the openSUSE distribution. Being in a community that allows you to say that you think that this is not enough and that you want to do something with it is another one. Wolfgang Rosenauer believed that something like that would be useful to users and gave birth to Project Evergreen.
Hi Wolfgang, I have some questions about the Evergreen Project that I got from a few people I talked about it. Let us start...
